content.detailedDescription: I was in the garden chasing the neighbours cat for having a crap on my lawn when i was blinded by a flash the source was a star like object in the sky i swayed from side to side and desended closer to the house rooftops i noticed a small capsule on top of it.I was scared so grabbed my camera to take a picture but the image was blurred and i raged throwing my camera at the cat smashing it in the process. i bent down to pick up my smashed camera i saw a second flash and the object had gone. unforuneatly i could not retrieve the picture from its broken memory
content.summary: The disc object desended above the houses there was a flash

content.detailedDescription:
I went outside to see if there was anything in my line of sight. there was an aircraft approaching from the wsw moving to the ene.  there were 3 amber lights, one on each point of the triangular aircraft with a solid red light on the belly of the craft.  this craft was out of my line of sight after 3 minutes.

a few minutes later on the eastern sky there were two aircrafts moving to the south...While i was watching one of them "disappeared", which i am guessing it went lights out.  it appeared shortly thereafter either closer to me or much higher in altitude.  it hovered and reversed heading to the north, just as being reported by pilots. then they were out of my line of sight...As clouds moved in.

i was excited to see the aircraft which i believe are the boeing tr-3b, from their phantom works project.

i was able to catch a few photos with my digital camera.
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Triangluar aircraft...3 amber lights, one on each point...Red light on the belly of craft

content.detailedDescription: I was star gazing in front of my home like always and noticed a bright yellowish light moving across the sky south to north at 10:50 and disappear after that about ten minutes later another one,a very small white ball of light moving right above me very high in the sky moving south to north at a very fast speed until i lost sight of it. later around 11:20 another very bright and large ball of white light closer than other ones moved south to north this one was different because the white light turned on and off for about four or five seconds each time,i pointed a laser at it and every time it shined brighter and brighter it blinked about five times and stopped blinking and i lost sight of it since i didn't know where exactly it went after that it didn't emit any more light  but also moved south to north. i couldn't get my iphone to take a picture or record since it was to dark.
content.summary: Multiple balls of light

content.detailedDescription:
I met this gentleman for the first time, well over a year ago. i was in my front yard with a telescope, upon seeing him i asked him to have a look. the next time i see him he relates this story to me. this happened to him in athens texas. at the time we spoke february 18, 2010, the event had just happened approximately ten days earlier. the time of the abduction was 11:00 or 11:30 pm.  he was shaking and had goose bumps covering his arms as he was telling me his story.   i reported this abduction to another web site but did such a botched job, i felt i had to file it again. 
subject got out of a car he was riding in with friends. he was going to walk across a field surrounded by woods to an apartment complex. his reason for not going directly to the apartments was that he did not want someone at the apartments to see him with his friends. as he was crossing the wooded area heading to the field he felt a presents above him. some how he knew it was a ufo without looking. he started running through the woods to escape. this is when he heard a twitching noise in the bushes in front of him. he turned and ran in a different direction but no mater which way he turned he would hear the same noises ahead.  the noises keep him running in a circle. then he became paralyzed and could only move in a jerking motion and fell to his knees. at this time god told him not to open his eyes. he became weightless for a few moments. next he was examined with some device that he called a scanner.  as it was moved around his head he could hear a buzzing sound similar to a radio being tuned across the band. this devise made his hair stand up as it was moved over his head. as he was relating this to me he was holding both sides of his head as if he were in pain.  while in the craft he hears someone say,  he is still alive. then hears someone one else say,  i need a transfer then a string of numbers.  for some reason he felt that these numbers were very important and related to me that he wished that he could be hypnotized to reveal the sequence. the duration of the time he was abducted was approximately fifteen minuets. he told me that he cried so much that his shirt was soaking wet. the event was so traumatic that he prayed to god that if he made it through the ordeal that he would give his life to god. when he was returned he was standing, his arms outstretched, looking up at the sky. the condition of the sky before the abduction was cloudy, after his return no clouds with the stars clearly visible.

i forgot to add this part.   he also told me that they scraped his skin,  i think he said his stomach.  he ask me why would they scrape his skin.  i told him that maybe they were collecting his skin cells for dna.    he said they must really like my dna
content.summary: Re :athens tx.  jan. 18. 2010 abduction

content.detailedDescription:
See multiple craft report on june 5th, event was june 3rd

briefly i witness numerous craft in a very short time frame.  most went high altitude and disappearing in an instant.  one was low altitute and appeared as a bright orange sphere

the last video is a airplane/jet flying over, just to show you what a airplane looks like through night vision
content.summary: This is the video from the report i submitted on june 5th

content.detailedDescription: Driving home on 152 eastbound in kansas city, mo. to my left was a very large v-shaped aircraft with a large red light at the tip and about 3 white lights going down each side of the craft. they were blinking, the craft was hovering in place and at times seemed to move very slowly forward. once it seemed to move very smoothly in a sideways "u" pattern, then resumed hovering. i took 169 north and got back onto 152 east and the craft was still there. my boyfriend took the same route home 30 minutes later and stated the craft was still there at the same location when he was driving down the interstate. he was able to take a few pictures although they do not do justice to the craft's size or presence.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: V-shaped aircraft with a red orb at the tip, and about 3 lights going down each side of the craft. mostly hovering, maybe some very slow forward movement.

content.detailedDescription:
I was about 10 years old & was outside playing in the dirt (with toy horses) and the air felt cool (like early spring or early fall) & i knew that it would be dusk sometime soon but it was still daylight. i felt like i was being watched & i stood up & instinctively looked above me. i was not afraid and just stood there looking. 

i observed a large disk space ship hoovering above me over our back yard. we lived in a place that used to be farmland, a new development still in the process of building townhouses (3 per building) & most were not complete yet & there were only a few young families who had moved in. the development was also next to a golf course. so it was kind of bare & isolated to some extent. not many people around to notice a spaceship over someones yard. i just stood looking up at the craft.  i noticed that it had 3 big lights... one was a dome light, 2 were underneath & were 2 different colored lights. then all of a sudden i noticed that i could see through the craft ... it was a disk and the middle was similar to a car steering wheel shape (like 3 spokes with spaces between them) wherein you could see between the spokes & now i noticed that i could see the stars & sky between the spokes. i wondered how that could be. 

as it was leaving, moving to my right and angleing up i could see it had lighted windows along the inside spokes & outside rim. as the craft moved swiftly up & away (at first like slow motion & then it was gone in seconds) i ran into the back door of the house to tell my mother. the house was not well lit, my mom wasn't inside so i ran out the front door & immediately stopped in my tracks confused that it was dark outside. 

my mother said what i saw was not possible unless it had been the sputnik. i am terrified of the movie "fire in the sky" & i have only seen brief parts of it... i feel like i am having a panic attack. i did not have any feelings like that at the time of sighting.
content.summary: Observed ufo hoovering above me... lost time.

content.detailedDescription:
From the roof of a house in the historical center of seville, some friends and i have seen and ufo while we were looking at the moon eclipse. 

one of my friends realised that a big and shiny yellow-orange light was coming from the opposite orientation of the moon. especifically it was going straight with constant height from the north-west to south east (in that moment the direction was going almost the situation of the covered moon).

right after watch it we realise that it was not a plane (one of my friends in the roof is aeronautical engeneer and he corroborated that it wasn't a normal flying object).

the intensity of the light, the color, the speed and the height were all constant. it was going faster than a plane considering the apparent height.

when we saw it we were excited because of what we were seeing, but we did not feel anything strange. it wasn't doing any strange noise as we could heard.

after 2 minutes watching it and going further, the perspective that we had in the roof of our building didn't allow us to see it anymore.

i'm attaching one video that i could record, i didnt have enough time to record it when it was closer, so the only thing that you'll see in the video is an small orange light.
content.summary: Bright sphere shape object, orange color, constant speed, straight movement

content.detailedDescription: Again same morning as before, different picture
content.summary: Showed up in a picture

content.detailedDescription: I'm a fairly avid ufo hunter in ripon wisconsin and was up early in the morning and took a few pictures of sunrise and caught something thats not usually there.  i've been using cameras to document this since 2007 and thought i might share some of the pictures i've come across
content.summary: Took a picture to find this

content.detailedDescription:
After my experiences i decided to tape or record my observations. i send my early records to mufon which is below

[links moved to additional evidence section/cms/tg]

i was get my camera for 15/june/2011 ecl������pse also i was an inner expectation that will see an ufo.

i was thinking to eclipse and ufos during, walking at the sea-side for turn back home.

when i was walking on the street i just look up in the air. but i had a feeling somthing to look up in the air first.(supposing it tend me to itself)

my first notice was it was a ufo beacuse i feel it, i observed the light and acts as in ufo category.

light was like flourescent, no signal lamps, very slowly moving like skying/sliding in the sky, no voice approximately over at my top.

i just focused to record the video good, i feel very happyness which mixed some exite.

it disappeared slowly go out of my visual area.

thank you.

[name removed/cms/tg].
content.summary: 2 minute ufo sighting at city centre turkey/izmir

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i were driving around in our convertable about 9 pm sunday june 12, 2011 when i happen to look up and saw this really bright round object in the sky. it got extremely bright and then it got real dim. it did this several times. at first i thought this was a falling star but it moved  from west to east.  i watched until it finally went out of sight. this was really strange. it was not an airplane or helicopter. it sounds like the persons in ky and ca saw what i saw.
content.summary: Real bright object in sw sky.

content.detailedDescription:
location of lights:  north of wickenburg, az, and west of hwy #93 which connects wickenburg to flagstaff, az, and continues to las vegas. area is sparsely populated, but easily seen from this busy highway.  
   conditions:  clear and hot with almost full moon at zenith, hence no stars were visible, being obscured by the backscatter of moonlight.
   description: at about 9:30 a single bright light in the western sky caught my eye through a window in my residence in congress, az, 10 miles north of wickenburg.  (phoenix is about 50 miles east of wickenburg.)
no stars or aircraft could be seen.  i waited for the light to move or blink, as would an aircraft light, however it simply disappeared after perhaps 20 seconds.  a moment later another light appeared, slightly lower and a few degrees north of the 1st light, and it became a sequence or row of five lights in a straight horizontal row.  the initial light went out and immediately the second light turned on, remaining for about 1/2 second, went out and the 3rd light turned on, and so forth for 5 lights total.  the separations between lights was uniform and it was clearly a row of lights, not a single light that was moving and blinking.
   this pattern of sequential lights was repeated 4 more times, at intervals of 5 to 10 minutes, during the next hour, but with significant variations.  specifically, the next 3 times the sequence was of 6 lights in the row, not just 5.  the 5th and last time the row was composed of 10 to 12 lights, which appeared much closer together and the on-off sequence was twice as fast as in the previous 4 appearances. each appearance was at a slightly different location in the sky, making it appear that the lights were attached to a rigid platform, such as a large ufo, which moved slowly over a distance of several miles.
   inbetween and even during the "row-sequence" appearances there were individual lights scattered about this area of sky, which single lights appeared for several seconds and then disappeared.  some were distinctly moving slowly but most appeared motionless.
   at about 10:30 a much brighter light appeared.  it was orange in color, much larger than the white lights, forming a circle of uniform brightness.  the orange light tuned on slowly, came up to full brightness and reamined so for perhaps 10 seconds and then faded into darkness.  still later, after most of the one hour show, a motionless green light appeared several times at various intervals.  it was a soft green, rather diffused and dimmer than any of the white lights.  after the green light had appeared 6 or 7 times over 5 minutes, all light activity seemed to have ceased and i stopped observing.
   of coursse distances of "lights in the sky" are impossible to judge with any accuracy, however the platform of 5, 6 or 10 sequential lights provided some visual clues.  thus, i would estimate the main light displays were west of me about 10 to 15 miles, which would put them a few miles west of highway #93, and thus easily visible by traffic on that busy highway.  perhaps a truckdriver has or will report similar sightings.
   if that rough distance estimate has any merit, it would require that the sequnce light platform be at least a half-mile in length, perhaps a full mile, as the sequence appeared a several locations at various heights above the horizon.
   this is not my first ufo sighting by any means.  my wife and i watched a "dance of 7 brilliant ufos in 1975 in minnesota and i photographed a ufo in scottsdale, az, in 2005, plus i have seen a dozen or so ufo-like phenomena. 
  i do not for a moment doubt that i was observing lights on board several ufo craft in this area for over an hour.  there was no sound, the actions were totally unlike any aircraft and no aircraft lights or stars appeared during this time period.  the purpose of displaying their lights in this manner seems clearly to be to make humans think and to raise human awareness that we are not alone in this wonderful universe.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: A sequence of lights appearing in a line, repeating in various locations over time, plus individual lights in same area

content.detailedDescription: I was unloading some wooden pallets off my truck on the county line of burnside, kentucky and somerset, ky  ... the area of town i was in at that time of night was a darker area of town, the sky was very clear, clearer than i had  seen in a very long time, what caught my attention was a bright light from my peripheral , i was like i said unloading pallet, so i wasnt really paying any attention to the sky at the moment but out of my peripheral i saw something get really bright in the sky, i looked to the direction it was coming from and saw what looked to me as a star that had gotten bright and i watched it slowy dim to nothing just disapeared.  this was very high in the sky, thats why i said it was star like, but why it went bright then dimmed to nothing ,  i told my wife maybe i witnessed an exploding star or something, but i know what i saw, and that is why i am writing , thought i would share with everyone, maybe someone might know what it was... thanks...
content.summary: Bright light in sky , slowly dimming and then disapeared

content.detailedDescription:
This is for a friend who works for the quebec sq. twice while on evening patrol between montabello and sturgeon lake he has caught glimpses of a light (yellowish/green/white) soar over the countryside. the first event happened in 2010 and the second just a few weeks ago (may 13 2011). the sightings are of a quick, jerky light that changes colour and direction. it follows the terrain and lights up the ground beneith it. my friend knows aircraft and it is not that. it changes shape depending on how you look at it. the first sighting last year was directly over the cruiser going from left to right but the second was out in the distance. appearantly there was something caught in the car's forward camera but it just shows as a bright light.

as an addendum, my friend does not want to be contacted directly as this will cause hardship at his work. he is looking to see if anything else was reported with the same description.
content.summary: Seen twice, different dates, yellowish/orange/green/white light

content.detailedDescription: Noted these lights in place where no lights should be as we drive this road (sr 72) quite often during the night after visiting friends in phx>  we began seeing them about 7 miles from vicksburg road on sr 72.  5 times we saw the lights become bright, each time a bit further west and every time, after about 1-3 mins, they faded...Not abruptly, they dimmed.  hard to tell shape anything other than the lights were clustered and we noted two clusters.  they moved west towards the colorado river and after the fifth time we never saw them again.  have no idea what we saw.
content.summary: Bright large clusters of amber light that faded in and out in the sky above and very clear of the mountains easily visualized to the north on this nearly full moon night

content.detailedDescription: i normally watch the skies once the sun goes down as a matter of habit living in the mountains over the mediteranean sea.  i have just come back from canada and been here in zitouna for about 5 weeks now.  on june 13th, i was watching the sky as it is so crystal clear and silent here looking directly north, and a large bright white light appeared, no other apparent anything, no noise, no strobing, relatively lower then the stars, moved east and disappeared in front of me.  then last night, june 14th, as with all the other reports i see on mufon, i saw exactly the same thing, only my sister in law watched it with me for several minutes appear from se and head in an irregular flight path ne over the sea and  appeared to be descending out of view.  no idea what it was, definitely not a plane, i don't think satellites fly at such a  low altitude, this object/orb appeared to be moving low over the mountain like it was close.  it definitely was unidentifiable.  i do not drink, or do drugs, i have a university degree, this was definitely wierd.  i will try to video it tonight if it comes back.
content.summary: 2 nights in a row!

content.detailedDescription:
I recently set up an outdoor area in my backyard and have been relaxing there in the evenings for several weeks. approximately 1 ��� weeks ago i observed a bright light suddenly appear in the northern sky, approximately 40 degrees above the horizon. it appeared to be moving in a northerly direction (away from me) at the speed of a conventional aircraft. there were no strobes or directional lights visible. as i watched, the light faded to black over the period of several seconds. this occluded around 9:00 pm and i assumed that it might have been a satellite or space debris passing momentarily into sunlight.
approximately four days later, i experienced the same phenomenon at approximately the same time. i watched carefully and confirmed there was only one single light, moving away from me. when the light initially appeared, it was the brightest light in the sky, reminding me of venus.  again, it faded quickly from sight and the entire event lasted 5-6 seconds. this second sighting convinced me that it was probably some of metallic object in orbit.
on this evening, (6-14-2011) i was enjoying a warm evening, again looking at the north sky. it was approximately 11:30 pm. the stars were somewhat faint and i could only really see the north star and the front two stars of the big dipper.  all of a sudden, i saw the bright light appear again. this time it was slightly higher in the sky well off to the right of the north star, and it was traveling east. just as the prior two incidence, it faded as it moved becoming invisible after about five seconds. as before i looked for any sign that it was an aircraft but saw none. i watched for about 15 minutes after it disappeared to see if it would reemerge, but it did not. in all three cases, i never heard any aircraft.
for investigative purposes, i would like to mention that beale afb is approximately 30 miles north of my location.  i am also very familiar with aircraft going in and out of mcclellan airpark and the sacramento international airport, both less than 10 miles to my west. these three incidents did not look anything like conventional aircraft that i am use to seeing.
content.summary: Bright star like object moves and fades out

content.detailedDescription:
I will try to recollect the event that occurred above the skies in athens, tx.  this will be the thing i remembered about that never forgotten night.
 
on tuesday, august 31, 2010 at 9:10 pm cst, my brother, "b" iv and myself witnessed an aircraft in the sky hovering above athens, texas.  we were on our way to the trace in downtown athens, tx for karaoke night.  it really took me by surprise in that i have never had an encounter of the first kind (ufo visual), when you actually see a aircraft in full view and there are no doubts in your mind that this is not a aircraft in the sky that you normally see like a private plane, commercial airline or a helicopter, that can hover.
 
what we saw that night was an aircraft shaped like a crunched up cigar with red lights permeating from the underside of the aircraft.  these lights actually show traveling toward the ground instead of just a bright shining red light.  i hate to say it is almost like a ray you would see shooting out from the underside of the object, like portrayed in the old movie, war of the worlds.
 
this object was seen approximately a quarter of a mile from us to the west on us highway 175 e., a little before turning off to get on the loop 7 towards the tyler exit off on highway 31.  my brother wanted to go get some cigarillos at valero service station across from walmart, but by the time he had bought these smokes and gotten back to us 175 w,to nobody's surprise, the object had vanished."
 
i don't know if i will ever be a witness like i was that tuesday night.  i had always dream when growing up and even until that night witnessing something that cannot be explained in logical thinking.
 
that next morning i called the local newspaper, athens daily review to see in fact if any other people had called into to let them know they had witness that phenomenon that night.  i was told that my brother and i were the only two people that called the newspaper to inform them about this ufo incident.
 
i am hoping that after this information, even though pictures could be taken, that this will be looked into, because another ufo incident occured this past thursday, june 9th of which i am not privy to the details, but the person that witnessed this gave that information to our local newspaper, the daily athens review.
 
this is the best narrative that i can explain the strange occurence that my brother and i witnessed that night.
 
i can be reached at this email address [email address removed/cms/tg] or at my personal cell telephone number [phone number removed/cms/tg].
 
 
                                                                                                            a baffled now athensite,
                                            
                                                                                                            [name removed/cms/tg]
content.summary: Ufo sighting over athens, tx on tuesday night, august 31st 2010 at 9:10 pm (ct)

content.detailedDescription: I always sit outside at night staring at the stars. i have a favorite bright red star that is usually right above my backyard patio. i was watching the sky when something to the right of my favorite star caught my eye. tonight a small "red star" (which later turned to a white normal star color) was flying up from a little left of the end of the "handle" of the big dipper, up and over my head, "jumping" very quickly, then pausing almost a full stop, then would begin moving at a steady pace, then pause, then shoot off a different direction at a very quick pace, then slow again, then "jump" into movement again, from steady to very fast pace/speed. i watched it go overhead, pass by the moon and over to the complete opposite side of the sky from which i saw it rise, and then eventually shoot off, and disappear from sight. it seemed very high up, and looked like a moving star. i have seen satellites in the sky with and without telescopes and i live close to an airport so i am very familiar with identifying planes and helicopters. this was very odd to see an object which changed speeds, directions, and seemed to pause and then jump back into motion. it stopped fully in two spots in the sky, right before it traveled out of sight. it stopped, like it was taking it's place among the stars in a set lil constellation or something, and then shot off, or just became invisible to eye sight. no sound at all, again it seemed very high up but was so interesting i did not stop watching, i even waited a few minutes after it disappeared from sight to see if it would reappear, but it did not. i have seen odd activity in the night sky from my backyard before, i actually usually see stars moving from their set place in the sky every night, and have shown it to family and friends when they have the patience to sit and watch. stars moving in zig zag patterns, shooting up then down or in odd patterns, not just shaky side to side star movement, full on totally noticeable distances at quick speeds and then random changes in direction. it is very confusing, but intriguing,  which is why i always go outside to watch the stars, i love to watch and wonder what exactly it is i am seeing and why. i would very much like to know what it is and what is going on. i do not have a camera that is strong enough to capture the stars in action but hope to be able to purchase one soon. my boyfriend and our good friends have seen the stars move in the sky before and have gotten freaked out, it happens so much its not scary, its exciting and a puzzle. i was calling to him to come outside and see this "red star" move all over and across the sky tonight but he didn't hear me call him. it was very fun to witness, and it's more fun to share the sights with people, as an exciting moment to share, and as a validation that i am not the only one seeing it, and that i am not crazy or hallucinating. :)
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Small red star, moving from one edge of the sky to the other in fast quick jumps, pauses, change of direction, change of color, to out of sight

content.detailedDescription:
I went outside to see how cool it was getting and was watching a jet airliner on its approach to san jose airport when i saw a very bright light.  at first i thought it was just a bright star then realized it was moving at a steady speed from west to east.  i figured it was a small (private) plane but it had no marker lights (blinking) and as it passed over the light never got dim as you would see landing lights dim as the front of the plane passes.  it was a constant brightness.  i would estimate it to be between 1000 to 2000 feet in elevation.  what struck me was that this object made absolutely no noise whatsoever.  i watched it as it flew over coe park then disappeared from site as i lost it behind the ridge.

it is possible i might have seen a satellite.  i have seen them many times before.  as with what i saw they too do not have any marker lights, however i have never seen a satellite this bright before.  it was as though venus moved across the sky.

i am wondering if anyone else saw it and if it was a plane, how could it be so quite.
content.summary: Very bright white light, similar to venus, passed overhead from west to east.

content.detailedDescription:
So it's so warm tonight that after the sun set i opened all the windows, blinds, and doors for fresh air. at about 1800 hrs (6pm) tonight i was walking by the dining room window where i have an amazing view of the santa cruz mountains where saratoga and cupertino are. at that time i had an overwhelming feeling all of a sudden that "they" were going to be back tonight.

just a bit ago, 2120 hrs (920pm) i was looking out the front door and saw a plane flying over the area. now, planes don't just "fly over" unless there is a reason such as the strange light activity that happens here all the time. i went out the front door and looked up. there it was! an orb! super bright white, about the size of 3 or 4 pin heads all put together. it was moving from sw to nne (towards the alum rock area). i ran and got my camera and start4ed to take pictures. they all came out as a blurry line moving around. my husband ron also saw this object. it was low, and fast. it changed it's trajectory also. it was as if it was going towards morgan hill following the 85, but then shifted almost directly overhead to go towards san jose. 

i watched it until it vanished from my line of site. there is another person who lives in campbell and is also keeping an eye on "strange objects" in the sky. i sent him a message to see if he saw it also (no response as yet). 

i noticed during the event about 4-5 planes and choppers in the area. at 2122 hrs, there was 10 planes and choppers flying over the area. after a few minutes, they slowly went on their way.

i am kicking myself for not grabbing my video cam to film this as i have been keeping it on the living room table ready to go. it's okay because they will be back tonight.

i will keep mufon and devlin posted when something happens again, and i will film it.
content.summary: I knew a few hours ago it would be back tonight!!!

content.detailedDescription:
A thunderstorm was moving in as i was driving home from piqua, ohio to troy, ohio (just north of dayton on i-75)between 5:30 and 6:00 p.M.  i was driving alone southbound on troy-sidney rd., which is a very pretty alternative to i-75. it was about 90 and extremely humid. i only had my phone camera with me but i really wanted to get a shot of the lightning bolts that i was seeing ahead of me! the storm was coming in from the southwest over troy.  i pulled off the country road, put my flashers on and stood outside my car with my arms resting on the door to stabilize my hands.  how lucky do you have to be to catch lighting--especially without a tripod?  so, i took lots of pictures, probably about 20 with the hope of capturing some lightning bolts. when i finished taking pictures i had to drive into the storm and it was very scary.  it was pouring rain so hard that i couldn't see and then there was hail!

a few hours after i got home, i downloaded my pictures to my computer and saw something strange!  it's a rectangular, flat looking ufo.  i did not see it when i took the picture, and i did not hear anything other than thunder in the distance.  we are about 10 or 15 miles north of dayton airport but this was not a plane coming in for a landing. i would have heard and seen that.

unfortunately, i had my phone camera resolution set pretty low and so it's not a high-quality picture.  i was standing outside my car, it was not taken through the windshield.  also, i checked the pictures before and after this one but no object!  i tinted picture to see the object better, the original is a color photo.  (i'll attach the original and two altered pictures to this report.)

i remember seeing something on a ufo tv show once about ufos being drawn to thunderstorms to get 'charged' up or powered up. that totally makes sense to me and this was a very powerful storm!

i'm very curious to learn what this object may have been and if anyone else has seen something similar.  please let me know if you have any more information on it.  i'd really appreciate it!
thanks for your time!
diana brower
content.summary: Caught picture of rectangular object during thunderstorm -- didn't see or heart it

content.detailedDescription:
I went to the ihop restaurant at night.  after drinking some soda i went outside for a cigarette.  first i saw a ball of fire over a main street about 200 yards away hovering.  then i saw an oval object about 42' long about 100 feet away.  because it was dark out i could barely see it.  it flashed 3 squares of white light on its left side every 7 seconds.  i watched it for a while before opening the restaurant door calling my friend who worked there to see.  my friend was with customers, and when i looked again for it it was gone.  2 nights later i found my head off my pillow with my eyes more than half way closed sometime during the night.  i saw a beings head looking at me with a tight face.  he had wrap around thin eyes that protruded from his face, almost like goggles.  he had a lower lip (human looking)and a small nose.  he had no hair.  his face around his nose looked kind of concave or angled in.  within 7 to 10 seconds his head flew straight backward, and his head and right arm flew up disappearing 2 feet away.  he appeared to be a specie of grey i never saw before.  i saw his right arm fly up, as he traveled backward 2 feet apparently disappearing into another dimension.  i fell right back to sleep.

when i woke up in the morning i found 2 deep long scratch marks on my left thigh.  since then i was having psychological difficulties.  but around day 4 after i got the feeling the being was and is my friend that the day after the night i seen him i was able to cope with things that were troubling me.  also, i feel he gave me confidence in dealing with my problems.  no matter how much i rejected his influence he came across as my friend.  like 2 other encounter experiences i had the color black and shadows have an indescribable power.
content.summary: Oval object barely seen at night

content.detailedDescription:
I and my g/f had gotten home from a park and eating, and i happened to look up while getting out of the car. overhead moving roughly north east was a small, white starlike object going like a bat out of hell. it was moving well faster than any plane that has gone over (we're in a flight path for a local airport). it took the thing less than 5 seconds to go about thru a yard's worth of sky (relative to my observations). also- the flight path wasnt the usual one to the airport. there were no formation lights, no blinking lights of any kind. it's what happened after it had disappeared from view that got me (and made me snicker):

15 seconds after it had disappeared from view, the unmistakable, and far too loud sound of a prop plane was heard. exactly if a prop plane was breaking the sound barrier, but if it was in a cartoon. no sound distortion, no rumble, just cessna noise. the were no other planes in the sky- i looked, and looked hard. the sound 'followed' the object at any rate. my only comment to my g/f was 'well, that was a pathetic attempt at a ufo covering it's butt.' 

whatever it was, it wasnt a plane.
content.summary: Small starlike object moving fast

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting in my cousin's room upstairs.  he has a window on his ceiling so you can see the sky.  i was just happening to be looking out the window when i saw a black saucer like craft high up in the sky.  it was still very bright out so i could see it clearly.  it was flying slowly overhead and was wobbling as it flew.  i have never seen anything like this in my entire life.  i wish i had a camera to take a picture or even a telescope to see it up close.  i just watched it in awe as it flew by, wobbling the entire time.
content.summary: Black wobbling saucer flying high in the sky

content.detailedDescription:
Very bright star-like object went over moose jaw around 11:30 pm on june 13, 2011, followed later by two dim star-like objects side-by-side. there may have been indication of a (not-so) stealth aircraft as there was one brief 'flash' of light too quick to determine whether it was stationary or not.

..
content.summary: Very bright star-like object moving ne, followed by 2 dim star-like objects

content.detailedDescription:
About 10pm my daughter, myself and son-n-law. (to see an exact duplicate of what i saw, youtube has video i found "ufo june 2011 pennsylvania, multiple crafts descend into woods, 6/3/11).

in our backyard and looking into the north west portion of the sky, we saw a couple of airplanes which we consider normal aircraft traffic. while continuing to look in this direction i saw an extremely bright white light coming toward us very low; in fact, it appeared to be just above the roof tops of the houses in the sub division behind us.

i told my daughter and son-n-law to look and asked if it was an airplane. my son's first response was "it's a plane" and he left the yard. my daughter and i continued to watch it. we both commented that it was flying lower than normal air traffic and the lights seemed to be abnormally bright for air traffic. we considered maybe it was a search helicopter but as it got nearer to us we realized that we could not hear a thing. 

my daughter then took the high powered binoculars (we can see moon craters they are so powerful) and started to scream "it's a ufo, a real ufo!" she then handed them to me. i used the binoculars and was shocked and awed over what i was seeing.

a large almost kite-diamond shaped craft that had very bright white lights in the middle of the front of the vehicle, however; the lights took up most of the front of it (not a headlight type). it's distance above us was about 4 single story houses stacked one on top of each other. it appeared to be flat on the bottom and all 3 sides were smooth rounded up. when it was directly over top of me, the light on the front shifted to a round white light under neath and i made the comment "i hope it doesn't beam me up!" (jokingly). we then noticed that the front where the lights had been seem to have a section "notched inward".  what was so amazing is no sound! it was gliding across the sky. as it passed over us i handed the binoculars to my son-in-law and he said the light changed again from underneath to the front. however, i am going to let him as well as my daughter make their own report. i only want to report my perception.

although we do have an afb about 30 miles to the east of us; i am the daughter of a retired af pilot. the b2 did come to mind but i am familiar with this plane and this craft did not resemble the b2. we also have "drones" but this did not resemble them.  we have a lot of air traffic at night because we are 40 miles north of an international airport. we are very familiar with planes and use a smart phone app that shows us air traffic. there was no plane in our vicinity at that "moment" and this craft did not resemble any air traffic we are very familiar.

i want to add that we have become avid skywatchers and it is my opinion that the more you watch, the more you see and the more you see and develop a love of the phenomena, the more connected you become as we now see up to 20 "orbs" per night and some will stop and glow as bright as the moon right near us. this phenomena is becoming more prevalent in my opinion and many are recording it. unfortunately i do not have the proper night time equipment to record these.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Triangle flat ufo

content.detailedDescription:
Left tj shepherd show in los vegas about 9:30 p.M.  we usually spend the night in vegas but decided to drive home to golden valley 8 miles from kingman, arizona.  halfway home my husband pointed out a star like fireball following  the car at window hight,  it disappeared in about 2  minutes vanishing.

i decided to try to catch up to the cars that were ahead of it that were going 65 mph.  i was the last car in line,  they took off so fast that i was  going 80 mph and i could no catch up with them.

now me and my husband were in the dark desert and the star-like fireball came right in front of the car.  it was going the same speed as us.  it was a little bit bigger than 3 feet across.  it followed us for about 2 minutes then vanished.  this all happened halfway between las vegas and kingman.

in the middle of this we were looking for power poles that might be arching.  there were no things that might have caused the event.  it was not military flares..I have observed these many times. it seemed to have intelligence.   it stayed about 65 mph and about 20 even feet from the passengers winders.

when the object was in front of the car it stayed about 15 feet even in front of the car.  i had a good look at the star-like  fireball.  my husband said this object appeared as a white really bright object.  when i first saw it i said to my husband "i guess they really  do exist."  when the star like fireball right in front of  the  car was observed i said i don't wan to be a specimen.

this all was observed at night so there are no pictures there is no military base.
there are no houses  at all.  

my husband was quiet and quietly observed.

the next time we go to vegas we will come back the next day.
content.summary: Fireball bright light traveling alongside then in front of car 65 mph

content.detailedDescription:
We were taking some pics of the burn-off at the local plastic factory, when i noticed that an object preceded a trail of smoke/vapors. it's trajectory remained the same throughout until it disappeared behind some cloud at the skyline. we took several pictures with a zoom camera, of which are of good quality. we have zoomed closer on our pc package for closer inspection and think that it could be studied in greater depth with better equipment. we have downloaded the pics to a file-share for anyone who wishes to study further. 

[link moved to additional evidence section/cms/tg]
content.summary: My friend emils and i were taking some pics of the burnoff from a local factory
